name: Crappy Voxel Painter
description:
WASDQE to move, IJKL move camera, 123 zoom, hold R to restart, T toggles move only mode

I made this on a plane ride from Seoul to San Francisco on June 19, 2017. It is sort of a remake of a game I made on a plane a couple years ago in SceneKit (more like ObscenelySlowToMakeAnythingKit). Things went much smoother this time using Unity and I took it a little bit of a different direction focusing on the painting idea rather than mirror/copy/paste which was the focus to the previous prototype.
